title: Front - End Developer (VueJS, JavaScript, HTML)
company_name: Công Ty TNHH LG CNS VIỆT NAM
job_description:
LG CNS is looking for qualified Front-end developer:
Design, develop, and maintain user interfaces for web applications.
Collaborate with UX/UI Designers to ensure intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.
Integrate APIs and back-end services to deliver full features.
Optimize interface performance (loading speed, cross-device compatibility).
Write clean, reusable, and maintainable code.
Analyze and troubleshoot front-end issues.
Stay updated and apply the latest technologies and frameworks.
requirements:
[Required]
Have at least 3 years of experience (Prioritize high experience)
Experienced web / mobile application development
Can develop HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery
Can develop based on Vue.js
Experienced with collaboration tools like Git, Jira and Confluence
Understand and use CI/CD
TOEIC 450 or equivalent
[Preferred]
Understand Back-end
Use Typescript
Experienced with Node.js
Experienced with javascript charts (Echarts, Chart.js, d3js, etc.)
Experience using Tailwind, MUI
OAuth development experience
Korean communication
Team management experience
